properties.name: idempotent.key.header
properties.description: HTTP Header in request to check for idempotent key. If found, this takes precedence over the annotation key.

properties.name: idempotent.inprogress.max.retries
properties.description: Maximum number of retries to wait for a concurrent request that is currently INPROGRESS.

properties.name: idempotent.inprogress.retry.initial.intervalMillis
properties.description: Initial interval in milliseconds for retrying the status check of an INPROGRESS request.

properties.name: idempotent.inprogress.retry.multiplier
properties.description: Multiplier for exponential backoff during INPROGRESS status check retries.
